ygData.subject: Re: Elidain
ygData.msgSnippet: Elidain, us refers to Wizards.  The class that has nothing.  Give me an example of what we have over any class, and I will bash it into the ground with
ygData.messageBody:
Elidain, "us" refers to Wizards. The class that has nothing. Give me
an example of what we have over any class, and I will bash it into the
ground with another example that blows it away. As to fizzles, etc... We
are the slowest casters in the game. I dueled a Necromancer that had the
same HP as I, and we agreed to do DD spells only, in which he did 160 damage
and I did 165. The Necromancer won. I have higher Magic resistance, but
his spells did full damage every time. My spell did full damage once, and
it looked to be about 4 damage the second time. Just so you know, we dueled
with NO BUFFS on. The speed of his spell was too much, as he always was
ahead of my casts. Anyways, I'm out. Someone try to tell me a reason
Wizards are better, and I will defend my statement that we suck.


- Zenon Amphitryon, 27th, Fennin Ro
